text: "Decent weapons, good boots... that sort of thing is always happening to me," said Mort, "I don't know what you're talking about." #Hogfather

passages.fragment: Decent weapons , good boots ... that sort of thing
passages.full_quote: <used>Decent weapons, good boots... that sort of thing</used>.
When <used>that sort of thing is</used> going on, mere collapsing palaces in the next world don't stand a chance

passages.fragment: sort of thing is always happening to me , ''
passages.full_quote: "This <used>sort of thing is always happening to me," he</used> moaned
"Excu<used>se me," said Mort, "b</used>ut where am I, exactly?"
"You just s<used>aid, "I don't know</used>, shall I ask him to go away?""
